Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Department of the Navy, Secretary of the Navy (SECNAV)
Additional Scope Comments: This submission is for record group 0428. At this time DON will also be submitting for RG 038 and 0127. Forms for remaining DON record groups will be submitted at a future date.
Transfer Instructions: After cutoff, transfer account to Naval History and Heritage Command (NHHC) for SECNAV and U.S. Navy accounts; transfer to Administration and Resource Management Division (ARDB) for U.S. Marine Corps accounts. Unclassified email: Transfer to the National Archives 15 years after cutoff.Classified email: Transfer to the National Archives 25 years after cutoff after declassification review.
Legacy Email Scope: Agency will be including legacy email for all items being used, dating back to approximately 2010
